cause.description:
John McCain opposed Internet freedom and Net Neutrality in June of 2006. He didn't just oppose it, he was the deciding vote - killing an amendment that would have protected Net Neutrality.
We will urge John McCain to reverse his opposition to Internet freedom.
1. Internet freedom is essential
2. Net Neutrality is a cornerstone to Internet freedom
cause.mission: convince John McCain to reverse his opposition to Internet freedom and Net Neutrality
cause.name: John McCain
